content: the perfect pattern for using up scraps of hand-dyed yarn and also precious mini skeins the feather & fan stitch pattern is easy to memorize instructions include details for making a baby blanket wrap or throw the pattern can be easily adjusted to any size **tools & materials** 3 5mm/e hook 4ply/fingering yarn in 6 colours baby blanket a total of 1 200 meters 1 312 yards - 400 meters 437 yards in main colour 5 x 80 meters 87 yards in contrast colours wrap a total of 1 275 meters 1 396 yards in 6 colours throw a total of 3 200 meters 3 500 yards in 6 colours **written pattern with video tutorial for stitch pattern**
